escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_donts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx

In the meantime, check out our bestsellers: https://kathykuohome.attn.tv/aJT3rwNOQRLG

But if I ordered a shoe off of the website would it not be coming from your warehouse?
Birkenstock: That's a good question. I will have to double-check that with my team to be sure. As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away!
Like I'm literally scrolling on TikTok right now and it's being advertised...
Birkenstock: I understand, and thanks for sharing this! I have already raised this with the team and will keep you posted.

SUPPORT

Explore personalized mattresses for better rest: https://helixsleep.attn.tv/aV2eSYw8EOK- .
Support
Helix Sleep: Thanks for reaching out to us! I'd be happy to help! Could you give me more context of your concern so I can assist you?
Return order

Helix Sleep: I'm sorry to hear that you'd like to return your order. You may initiate your return here: https://helixsleep.attn.tv/acU9MP6Y0PrQ

You can also check out our detailed return policy here: https://helixsleep.attn.tv/aI3fmTc964FX
I already done this and got one email and no response
Template used: "Tracking Info - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:47:28.277

Helix Sleep: I'm sorry about that. I want to assure you that we take each request very seriously and are doing our best to respond to everyone as promptly as possible. Your concern is very important to us and I promise that a member of our team will get back to you. We hope for your continued understanding, and thank you for allowing us to assist you. 

 If you don't see the team's response in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well.
